original_text: So he went with them. They arrived at the Jordan River. They started to cut down some trees.
korean_text: 드디어 그들과 함께 가니라 무리가 요단에 이르러 나무를 베더니

sentences.original_text: They arrived at the Jordan River.
They started to cut down some trees.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나무 몇 그루를 베기 시작했습니다.
